name: Cross Bike Racer | Moto Racing Game For Free
name_original: Cross Bike Racer | Moto Racing Game For Free
description:
Are you ready to live the greatest adventure of your life?

By downloading this game you'll open yourself to a funny racing world!

Choose the most powerful bike and start racing at high speed!

For all the boys & girls who really enjoy block environments, this game is made for them!

Combining Blocky Motorcycles, High-Speeds and tons of fun, this surely is an amazing motorbike racing game!

Start crafting at your own style in this free-riding motorbike game!

Enjoy it before it is too late!

Give us a like on Facebook: www.facebook.com/LabCaveGames
